newsitem.title: SWEDEN: LUFTHANSA HINTS AT NORDIC CARGO RATE RISES.
newsitem.headline: LUFTHANSA HINTS AT NORDIC CARGO RATE RISES.

text.p: Lufthansa Cargo AG said on Thursday it would meet next week to consider air cargo rate increases from the Scandinavian market and hinted that the market was busy enough to support a rise.
"We have meetings next week when we will evalutate the whole thing," Lars Gurfeldt, spokesman for Lufthansa Cargo northern Europe, told Reuters.
An increase hinges on demand from the European continent but the final decision rests with the local market, he said.
Lufthansa Cargo expects high demand this autumn from the Swedish market, he said.
"We expect to have a clearer picture the last week in August on what routes there will be rate increases," Gurfeldt said.
